      • createClientCredentials

        public static AccessToken createClientCredentials(java.lang.String scope)
                                           throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                                  AuthenticationException,
                                                  InvalidRequestException,
                                                  ObjectNotFoundException,
                                                  NotAllowedException,
                                                  SystemException
        Create a ClientCredentials granted Oauth AccessToken. This is seldomly used and is not the same as a AuthorizationCode granted access token. You most likely don't want this method and want one of the create methods.
        Parameters:
        scope -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        ObjectNotFoundException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException
